dimensions.label: Risk Tolerance
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach new opportunities?

options.description: Your FarTwin will boldly pursue new opportunities, taking calculated risks to achieve success.
Your FarTwin will carefully consider new opportunities, weighing potential risks and rewards before making a decision.

dimensions.label: Emotional Expression
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin express their emotions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will freely express their emotions, wearing their heart on their sleeve and being vulnerable with others.
Your FarTwin will carefully control their emotional expression, only revealing their true feelings to trusted individuals.

dimensions.label: Decision Making
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach decision making?

options.description: Your FarTwin will rely on logical reasoning and analysis to make informed decisions, weighing data and evidence before acting.
Your FarTwin will trust their instincts and intuition to guide decision making, relying on gut feelings and hunches to navigate uncertain situations.

dimensions.label: Social Interactions
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin interact with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be highly social and outgoing, effortlessly connecting with people from diverse backgrounds and making friends easily.
Your FarTwin will prefer to interact with others in a more low-key setting, taking time to warm up to new people and situations before opening up.

dimensions.label: Conflict Resolution
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle conflicts?

options.description: Your FarTwin will address conflicts directly and assertively, standing firm on their ground and refusing to back down from a fight.
Your FarTwin will navigate conflicts with tact and diplomacy, seeking common ground and finding mutually beneficial solutions that satisfy all parties involved.

dimensions.label: Learning Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin learn new information?

options.description: Your FarTwin will learn best through visual aids, such as images, videos, and diagrams, which help them to better understand complex concepts.
Your FarTwin will learn most effectively through sound-based methods, such as lectures, podcasts, and music, which aid their comprehension and retention.

dimensions.label: Creativity Expression
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin express their creativity?

options.description: Your FarTwin will channel their creativity through artistic pursuits, such as painting, drawing, writing, or playing music.
Your FarTwin will express their creativity by developing innovative solutions to complex problems, often pushing the boundaries of what's thought possible.

dimensions.label: Responsibility Level
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle responsibility?

options.description: Your FarTwin will accept and shoulder significant responsibilities with ease, taking ownership of their actions and consequences.
Your FarTwin will be more cautious when it comes to responsibility, preferring to carefully consider commitments before committing to them.
